alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 11 at 3:00AM PDT until April 12 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM PDT /11 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 3 AM PDT /3 AM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona and southern Nevada. * WHEN...From 11 AM PDT /11 AM MST/ this morning to 3 AM PDT /3 AM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult...especially for motorcycles and high profile vehicles and create areas of blowing dust or sand...resulting in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times. Dangerous boating conditions will occur on Lake Mead and Lake Mohave. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Postpone boating plans on Lake Mead and Lake Mohave or stay in sheltered areas.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range
